deadhead.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to remove the dead or dying flowers from a plant
deadhead.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who avoids paying their fare on a train, bus etc
deadhead.translation[2].definitions[0].d: a deadhead journey by a truck, bus etc is one on which no goods or passengers are being carried
deadhead.translation[2].definitions[0].e: Our trucks usually operate with full loads, avoiding deadhead miles.
deadhead.translation[3].definitions[0].d: to drive a truck or bus without carrying any goods or passengers
